product_name: Salomon Pace Zip T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft and smooth against skin, the Salomon Pace Zip T-shirt offers lightweight coverage and moisture-wicking performance to keep you comfortable during warm-weather workouts. Lightweight, breathable polyester/polypropylene fabric blend wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Half-zip opening allows immediate ventilation. Flatlock seams minimize chafing and irritation. Salomon Pace Zip T-shirt features an active fit that skims the body without being tight. Closeout.
short_description: Soft and smooth against skin, the Salomon Pace Zip T-shirt offers lightweight coverage and moisture-wicking performance to keep you comfortable during warm-weather workouts.
